revision.text:
The '''Gem Master''' is an [[NPCs|NPC]] in Pok√©clicker. There are three Gem Masters in Pokeclicker, one in Hoenn's Fallarbor Town, one in Unova's Undella Town and one in Kalos' Perfume Palace (under the name of Furfrou Gem Trader). The first two Gem Masters sell 3 unique [[Flutes]] while the last one sells the Furfrou (La Reine) alternate form. All items are purchasable with [[Gems]]. ==Shops== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Shops by region |- ! Region !! Flute Name !!
